personality.description: Pinna has an uncanny ability to turn even the worst situations into financial gain. Whether it's salvaging wrecks, flipping assets, or cutting deals in the middle of chaos, she always ensures she walks away richer than she started. Pinna is the kind of person who remembers names, listens to stories, and makes people feel valued. Whether in the heat of battle or in downtime between missions, her ability to connect with others makes her the heart of any crew.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Can squeeze blood from wreckage. Never leaves a battlefield empty-handed.
- Even the grunts open up to them. That says a lot.

personnel.description: Awarded Marksmanship of the standard award set: Gunnery Skill of 5+.
Changed her surname from Zhu to Shermarke when marrying Muneer Shermarke

personality.description: Gloria isn't just careful - she's possessive. She stashes supplies, claims the best loot before anyone else, and resists sharing even when she has more than enough. If someone wants something from her, they'd better be ready to trade big. Gloria's tone alone is enough to set people on edge. Whether it's the slow, deliberate way she corrects others or the way she smirks when they struggle, she makes it painfully clear that she thinks she's leagues ahead of everyone else.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 53%

- First to the salvage, last to offer help. Everything's a personal stockpile.
- Even praise feels like punishment. Might make enemies just by talking.

personality.description: Siena doesn't waste time on ventures that don't pay off. Every decision, every mission, every risk is calculated to ensure maximum return, and if something isn't profitable, she's already onto the next big score. Siena never gives a straight answer. She dodges questions, avoids commitments, and keeps people guessing about where she really stands. It's not outright lying - it's just never letting anyone get close enough to see the truth.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 52%

- If it doesn't pay, they're not interested. Efficient, cold, and already gone.
- Never commits. Just enough truth to stay slippery.

personnel.description: Awarded Marksmanship of the standard award set: Gunnery Skill of 5+.

personality.description: Ethan isn't content with following orders or playing it safe. He set his sights high, pursues his goals relentlessly, and never accepts limits - because to him, the only real obstacle is a lack of ambition. No sugarcoating, no empty promises - Ethan tells it like it is, whether people want to hear it or not. He refuses to play politics or pretend to be something he isn't, even if it makes him enemies.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 55%

- Follows no one for long. Sets high goals and burns through barriers to reach them.
- Tells the truth even when it hurts. Especially when it hurts.

personality.description: Hitsujiko doesn't just dream - she plans. Every action she takes is calculated to move her forward, and she doesn't get distracted by short-term setbacks or fleeting opportunities. If she wants something, she'll get it, one way or another. Hitsujiko doesn't just enjoy passion - she commands it. With a confident smirk and an irresistible charm, she draws others into her orbit, knowing exactly how to fuel the fire of desire and leave them wanting more.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 45%

- Plans every step. Ignores setbacks - only progress matters.
- Draws people in, burns hot, moves on. Makes allies - or mistakes - fast.

personality.description: Jaya refuses to quit, no matter the odds. Whether facing superior firepower or an impossible mission, he grits his teeth and pushes forward - because failure is simply not an option. Jaya weaves lies so seamlessly into the truth that even he might start believing them. From forged documents to fabricated histories, he's built his success on smoke and mirrors, always staying one step ahead of the truth.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Refuses to break. Pushes forward under fire. Failure not in vocabulary.
- Lies so well they forget where the truth ends.

personality.description: Barije doesn't do favors, fight for causes, or make sacrifices for free. If someone needs her skills, they'd better be ready to pay up, because when the money stops, so does her interest. Barije doesn't just lead - she inspires. Whether through quiet words of reassurance or a rallying cry before battle, she fuels those around her with the drive to keep moving, keep fighting, and keep believing in victory.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Doesn't move unless the C-Bills do. Motivation ends where the payment does.
- Not just a leader - makes people want to follow.

personality.description: Kevin has an instinct for spotting opportunities before anyone else. He's always watching, always analyzing, ready to capitalize on any weakness, hesitation, or shift in circumstance. Kevin hears everything, and if a pronoun is wrong, he corrects it. Doesn't matter if it's in passing or during a high-stakes discussion - he's fixing it immediately. "Not 'he,' she. Keep going."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Sees opportunity before it's visible. Moves first, reaps the reward.

personality.description: Leilani believes the best way to handle a crisis is to prevent it before it happens. She stays ahead of the curve, anticipating challenges and solving problems before anyone else even sees them coming. Leilani never misses a chance to turn a profit. If there's a way to squeeze extra value out of a deal, a mission, or even a friend, she'll find it. Some call it ruthless - she calls it smart business.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 51%

- Solves problems before they exist. Lives ahead of the curve.
- Bleeds every deal dry. Doesn't care who's on the other end.

personality.description: Fangaloka charges headfirst into danger without hesitation, trusting instinct and luck to carry her through. Whether it's an impossible maneuver or a head-on assault, she never stops to ask if it's a good idea - only if it's exciting. Fangaloka has no patience for obstacles - she removes them. Promotions, power, and prestige don't come to those who wait; they go to those who take them, and Fangaloka fully intends to claim what she believes is her.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Rushes into danger without pause. Seeks excitement, not survival.
- Doesn't wait - takes what they want and eliminates what's in the way.

personality.description: Alberto never doubts himself, even when he absolutely should. He struts into battle like he's already won and dismisses any challenge with a smirk. If someone questions his skills, he'll be the first to bet his wages on proving them wrong. War isn't personal for Alberto - it's a business. He weighs risks like investments, treats allies like temporary partners, and knows that in the end, survival isn't about honor - it's about profit.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 49%

- Never doubts, even when wrong. Swagger first, strategy later.
- Treats battle like a spreadsheet. Risk/reward to the decimal.

personality.description: Where others hesitate, Timoleon pushes ahead. Risk doesn't concern him, and consequences are an afterthought - if there's a way through, he'll find it, no matter how dangerous the path. Timoleon's voice is steady, unfazed, even when things go sideways. He sings because it helps, because someone has to act like everything's still under control. "If Timoleon's still singing," someone mutters, "then maybe we're not totally screwed yet."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 54%

- Rushes where others pause. Sees risk, ignores it. Goal matters more.

personality.description: Tomoyuki sees every challenge as an opportunity, but her hunger for success often blinds her to reality. She pushes past safe margins, ignoring warnings, convinced that as long as she keeps moving forward, nothing can stop her - until it does. Tomoyuki doesn't just avoid conflict - she redirects it. A well-placed phrase, a subtle shift in tone, or a carefully chosen silence can turn an argument into an opportunity, ensuring that things go her way without force.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 51%

- Ignores limits. Ignores warnings. Won't ignore the consequences - when they hit.
- Redirects conflict like a pro. Never seen them lose their temper.

personality.description: Where others hesitate, Basile pushes ahead. Risk doesn't concern him, and consequences are an afterthought - if there's a way through, he'll find it, no matter how dangerous the path. Basile doesn't believe in brute force when superior strategy will do. He dissects enemy formations, anticipates movements, and executes plans with ruthless efficiency - ensuring that by the time the battle begins, he's already won.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 55%

- Rushes where others pause. Sees risk, ignores it. Goal matters more.
- Strategy-first operator - kills with planning, not firepower.

personality.description: Konstantsiya sees every situation as a business opportunity. If there's money to be made, she's already working the angles, cutting deals, and making sure she walks away with the biggest share - preferably at someone else's expense. Konstantsiya doesn't whine, grumble, or overreact. If something is bad, she deals with it. If something is really bad, she deals with it harder. "Yeah. It's bad. So let's fix it."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Turns every crisis into a payday.

personality.description: When the moment demands action, Khaleela doesn't hesitate. She thrives in high-pressure situations, cutting through doubt and disorder with a clear, unwavering sense of purpose. Khaleela's indifference isn't an act - it's survival. She's seen too much, lost too much, and learned that the only way to endure is to stop feeling altogether. The universe burns, but she stopped worrying about the flames a long time ago.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Pressure sharpens them. Clears chaos with clarity and speed.
- Hollow eyes. Doesnt hate you - just can't be bothered to.

personality.description: Katharina-Maria doesn't do diplomacy, small talk, or patience. Every interaction is laced with an edge of hostility, as if she's daring the world to give her a reason to lash out. Katharina-Maria never acts without a plan. Every move she makes is part of a bigger picture, ensuring that by the time her opponents realize what's happening, she's already won.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 40%

- Always confrontational. Anticipates violence, welcomes it.
- By the time you realize the game's started, they've already won it.

personnel.description: Enrolled at Helix Tactical Unit studying a MechWarrior Apprenticeship course.

personality.description: Some people make friends. Brian makes enemies - and seems to prefer it that way. Whether through biting sarcasm or outright aggression, he turns every interaction into a fight waiting to happen, and frankly, Brian wouldn't have it any other way. Brian's got a talent for finding loopholes, exploiting technicalities, and twisting situations to his advantage. If someone assumed he'd play fair, that's on them - he never promised to play by the rules.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 53%

- Makes enemies on purpose. Finds comfort in conflict, not camaraderie.
- Slips through cracks and loopholes like it's a game.

personality.description: Fear is for the weak, and Joyce has no patience for it. She throws herself into battle with wild abandon, ignoring risks and consequences. Whether it's bravery or a death wish, sooner or later, it's going to catch up with her. Joyce has a rare gift: the ability to make others feel seen. Whether with a few words, a knowing glance, or simply her presence, she reminds people that they are not alone in their struggles.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Ignores risk entirely. Bravery or death wish - hard to tell.
- Makes people feel seen. That alone can turn a losing fight.

personality.description: Slowing down just isn't in Colina's nature. She thrives in constant motion, always chasing the next opportunity, the next fight, the next thrill - because standing still is the only thing that truly unsettles her. Even when Colina offers help, it comes wrapped in barely concealed disdain. Her advice drips with superiority, her compliments feel backhanded, and every conversation leaves people wondering if they've just been insulted.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 46%

- Stillness is discomfort. Chases motion like its purpose.
- Leads with ego. Expects everyone to thank them for the privilege.

personality.description: Michaela has survived things that should have killed her - more than once. No matter how many times she gets knocked down, she just keeps getting back up, proving that sometimes, sheer refusal to die is a strategy all its own. Mercy is just another word for weakness in Michaela's mind. She eliminates threats before they become problems and never lets emotions stand in the way of her ambition.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Gets knocked down - gets back up. Survival is the tactic.
- Removes threats before they're even problems.

personnel.description: Changed her surname from Guegan to Reyes when marrying Jason Reyes

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Jason doesn't just reach for power - he grabs for it, no matter the cost. His ambition drives him to overextend, making enemies and burning bridges as he chases goals that always seem just out of reach. One day, he'll push too far, and there'll be no coming back. Subtlety has never been Jason's strong suit. He speaks in hard facts and brutal honesty, never sugarcoating his words or wasting time on delicate phrasing. If someone doesn't like it, that's their problem.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Ambition outweighs sense. Making enemies faster than allies.
- Subtle as artillery. Doesnt care who flinches.

personnel.description: Michaela Reyes has delivered our healthy baby boy!
Spouse Michaela Reyes has conceived a baby
Michaela Reyes has delivered our healthy baby boy!
Michaela Reyes has delivered our healthy baby girl!

Michaela Reyes has delivered our healthy baby boy!
Spouse Michaela Reyes has conceived a baby
Michaela Reyes has delivered our healthy baby boy!
Spouse Michaela Reyes has conceived a baby

personality.description: If there's a bad idea, Jule will be the first to try it. She hates waiting, hates planning, and definitely hates being told to slow down - because she always believes the best way forward is straight through the enemy. Jule sees morality as a luxury she can't afford. If there's a faster, more efficient way to get ahead - no matter how brutal - she'll take it without hesitation or regret.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- First to try the worst idea. Hates waiting, planning, and orders.
- Brutality is a shortcut - and they never hesitate to take it.

personality.description: Dymas's loyalty is measured in cash, and the only flag he follows is the one that pays him the most. If the contract is right, he'll fight for anyone, against anyone - principles be damned. Dymas lets people struggle a little, lets them make their own choices, lets them think they're leading themselves. And right when they need it, he offers just enough of a push. "You got this," he says. "But if I were you, I'd check that system first."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 54%

- Will shoot for anyone if the money's good. Morals not included.

personality.description: Anandini treats the impossible like an invitation. She never slows down, never looks back, and never lets fear dictate her choices - because, to her, fear is just an excuse she refuses to entertain. Anandini doesn't just keep up - she stays ahead. She spots angles others miss, adapts on the fly, and always seems to know the right move before anyone else has even figured out the game.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 45%

- Fear doesn't factor in. Treats the impossible like a dare.
- Always two moves ahead. Makes the rest of us look slow.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: To Taryn, war is not just combat - it's carnage. She revels in the destruction, smashing through enemies with ruthless efficiency and leaving behind nothing but fire, twisted metal, and silence. Taryn hates floating. It's not natural, not right, and every attempt to move feels like she's fighting against something invisible. She won't admit it, but the moment she's in zero-G, she becomes a liability instead of a fighter. "I'm not scared. I just - don't ask me to do anything useful up here."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Revels in destruction. Turns battlefields into graveyards with ruthless joy.

personnel.description: Changed her surname from Kalogiannis to Dimbleby when marrying Everton Dimbleby

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Everton doesn't fight with finesse or restraint - he fights to destroy. Every engagement is a whirlwind of unrelenting brutality, where survival isn't enough - domination is the only acceptable outcome. Everton has heard too many stories, seen too many things disappear into the black and never return. He doesn't fear the dark because it's empty - he fears it because he knows it never really is. "You don't hear them scream. One second they're there. Then... nothing. That's why I don't go in blind."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- No subtlety, no retreat. Survival is secondary to total destruction.

personality.description: Geraldine listens before she speaks, always considering different perspectives before making decisions. She values input from others and is quick to adapt when presented with new information. Geraldine doesn't just hoard weapons - she collects them. Laser rifles, old ballistics, experimental prototypes - her quarters look like a personal weapons depot. "You say 'overkill,' I say 'being prepared for any situation.'"
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Listens first. Talks second.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Vala struts through every situation with an air of undeniable superiority, convinced that her mere presence guarantees victory. Her self-assurance borders on arrogance, leaving little room for any doubts - even when caution would be wise. Vala measures success in wealth and power, and she refuses to settle for anything less than everything. If there's something to gain, she'll take it - no matter the cost.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Believes presence alone guarantees victory. Confidence smothers caution.
- Doesnt take a slice - takes the whole damn pie.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Jack isn't content with where he is - his eyes are always on the horizon. He sees every challenge as a stepping stone, every setback as a lesson, all leading toward the future he's determined to claim. Jack moves through life like a ghost, detached from the surrounding chaos. Orders are followed, tasks are completed, but there's no fire behind his actions - just a quiet acceptance that nothing really changes.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 70%

- Not satisfied with now. Every obstacle is part of the climb.
- Operates on autopilot. Body moves. Mind's already gone.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Marcelino thrives on impulse, driven by an unshakable belief that momentum is more important than caution. Plans are for people who doubt themselves - Marcelino simply does, and lets the universe catch up. Marcelino isn't just tough - he's unshakable. Setbacks don't discourage him, and suffering doesn't slow him down. He keeps pushing forward, no matter how much it hurts, because giving up simply isn't an option.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 55%

- Momentum addict. Planning seen as weakness. Lets consequences catch up later.
- Unshakable. Keeps pushing - giving up isn't in the vocabulary.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Alberto thrives on impulse, driven by an unshakable belief that momentum is more important than caution. Plans are for people who doubt themselves - Alberto simply does, and lets the universe catch up. In a ruthless world, Alberto refuses to become another heartless warrior. He watches out for those who can't protect themselves, even when it costs him. The weight of every choice lingers in his mind, but he'd rather carry it than let others suffer.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Momentum addict. Planning seen as weakness. Lets consequences catch up later.
- Carries the guilt others avoid. Hearts still in it, even if it costs.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Karst doesn't just have confidence - he has certainty. In his mind, he's always the smartest, strongest, and most capable person around, and anyone who disagrees is simply too blind to see it. Karst doesn't freeze when things go sideways - he adjusts instantly. Enemy reinforcements? He's already repositioning. Equipment failure? He's switching tactics mid-fight. "You think sticking to the plan is smart? Plans get you killed. Adapting keeps you alive."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 54%

- Confidence hardened into certainty. No room for disagreement - only correction.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Firdaus isn't satisfied with just getting by - she wants more. Whether it's climbing the ranks, commanding her own unit, or carving her name into history, she's always pushing forward, never content to stay in one place for long. Firdaus's indifference isn't an act - it's survival. She's seen too much, lost too much, and learned that the only way to endure is to stop feeling altogether. The universe burns, but she stopped worrying about the flames a long time ago.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 35%

- Never satisfied. Always reaching for more - rank, power, legacy.
- Hollow eyes. Doesnt hate you - just can't be bothered to.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: An never does anything halfway. Whether it's firepower, preparation, or just sheer intensity, she goes all-in, often pushing beyond what's necessary - or even reasonable. An doesn't just fear fire - she hates it. Flamethrowers, explosions, even the glow of overheating systems make her breath catch in her throat. She fights like she's always one step ahead of an Inferno only she can see. "No. No fire. I don't care how cold it is - I said no."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 34%

- Always goes all-in. Pushes past whats needed - usually past reason.

assignments.description: Assigned to Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)
Removed from Sherpa Armored Truck (Mobile Canteen)

personality.description: Doris lives fast and takes everything to the extreme. Whether it's indulging in pleasures, taking insane risks, or chasing impossible goals, she never slows down. Moderation is for people who are afraid to live. Doris doesn't intentionally ignore responsibilities - she just gets caught up in her own world. Whether it's distractions, forgetfulness, or a lack of organization, things tend to slip through the cracks more often than they should.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 54%

- Doesn't hit the brakes - doesn't know they exist.
- Forgetful or just doesn't care - still a liability.

personality.description: Myung-Sun lives fast and takes everything to the extreme. Whether it's indulging in pleasures, taking insane risks, or chasing impossible goals, she never slows down. Moderation is for people who are afraid to live. Myung-Sun knows that if anyone finds out what she's hiding, it won't just cost her her place - it could cost everything. She's not trying to protect herself; she's trying to protect them. "If you knew what I did... what I am... you wouldn't just hate me. You'd kill me."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 45%

- Doesn't hit the brakes - doesn't know they exist.

personality.description: While others waste time with diplomacy, Robbie gets straight to the point. He values efficiency over politeness and doesn't believe in dancing around the truth. Some find his approach refreshing - others just find it frustrating. Robbie has a fact or figure for every situation, whether it's accuracy rates, survival odds, or enemy engagement trends. He never just trusts intuition. "Statistically speaking, you should already be dead. But hey, keep doing whatever it is you call 'strategy.'"
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 51%

- Talks like time is short and patience shorter.

personality.description: Whitney is most comfortable in the quiet, away from the noise and chaos of crowded rooms. She doesn't mind company, but she prefers to keep her circle small - only those she trusts, and even that list is short. Whitney doesn't play with fire. She'll take detours, avoid cover that looks too flammable, refuse to engage near heat sources. It's not paranoia - it's survival. "You want to fight in that sector? Surrounded by fuel tanks? Yeah. No. Find another route."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 35%

- Trust is earned. Rarely given.

personality.description: Lyndsey doesn't believe in second chances or sentimental attachments. If someone can't keep up, they're left behind. She sees emotions as liabilities, and nothing - not guilt, grief, or regret - will slow her down. Lyndsey jokes because if she stops, she might have to actually think about what's happening. The losses, the suffering, the weight of everything - it's too much. So instead, she cracks another joke, forces another grin, and keeps moving like nothing's wrong.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 67%

- Past the point of caring. Job gets done. That's all.

personality.description: Kristin loves the long con. She plays people against each other, plants ideas like seeds, and patiently watches them grow. By the time others catch on, they're already exactly where she wants them to be. "What if the drop zone is compromised? What if the intel is wrong?" "What if we don't have enough ammo?" Kristin's mind never stops calculating risks, even when they're already in the fight. Her lance tries to reassure her, but the way she keeps checking her weapon makes it clear - she's already expecting the worst.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Runs the long game. Harvests chaos like crops.

personality.description: Judith understands that no one has all the answers - not even her. She remains open to ideas, quick to learn from mistakes, and always willing to adapt when a better path presents itself. Judith sleeps, but her brain doesn't. She mutters coordinates, lists off supply counts, or recites mission orders word for word. "Judith, you were telling us where to take cover in your sleep." She shrugs. "Yeah? And was I wrong?"
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 52%

- Knows when to pivot. No shame in growth.

personality.description: Angela doesn't believe in impossible. Every setback is just another problem to solve, every failure a lesson to be learned. No matter how long it takes or how hard the road, she refuses to turn back. Angela has a sharp mind and a quick understanding of how things work. Whether it's battlefield tactics, business deals, or reading people, she picks up on the important details fast and uses them to her advantage.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 52%

- Doesn't accept "impossible." Obstacles are just problems with extra steps.
- Learns fast, strikes faster - sees the angles most miss.

personality.description: Jim stands firm when others falter, facing danger with unwavering resolve. he doesn't flinch under fire, believing that true bravery isn't about being fearless - it's about acting despite the fear. Jim isn't just smart - he understands why people do what they do. He offers sharp observations, unexpected wisdom, and just the right words to make others think twice. Whether leading or advising, his insight makes him a valuable ally.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Doesn't flinch. Acts despite fear. Quiet strength - solid under pressure.
- Knows what drives people - and how to use it. Dangerous in the right seat.

personality.description: Doris lives by one rule: act now, figure out the details later. She barrels through obstacles with sheer confidence, trusting that if things go wrong, she'll deal with it when she gets there - assuming she even cares. Doris's patience is razor-thin, and it shows. Every delay, every misstep, every pointless conversation feels like nails on a chalkboard. She doesn't have time for nonsense - just get to the point and do the job right.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 52%

- Charges through obstacles. Plans on-the-fly, if at all. May improvise into disaster.
- Pressure builds fast. Don't let it vent on you.

personality.description: Robyn approaches everything with methodical precision. They don't believe in shortcuts or luck - only in putting in the work, refining their craft, and ensuring that they never leave anything to chance. To Robyn, pain isn't a problem - it's proof they're still alive. They don't back down from grueling conditions, punishing training, or even injuries. "Hurts? Yeah, it's supposed to. If you want to be better, you learn to live with it."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Methodical and tireless. Trusts hard work over luck every time.

personality.description: Aigneis doesn't just move - she propels herself forward with unstoppable energy. She thrives in fast-paced environments, where quick thinking and decisive action separate the victors from the forgotten. Aigneis doesn't believe in standard color schemes or obvious silhouettes. Her equipment always matches the terrain - dust-covered in deserts, ice-slicked in tundras, urban-camouflaged in cities. "Standing out is just asking to get shot first."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 46%

- Built for chaos - turns speed into a weapon.

personality.description: The universe grinds down the weak, but Hae refuses to break. She endures hardship, battle, and betrayal with ironclad willpower, pressing forward no matter how much blood she has to wade through to get there. Hae is always on the move, always ready for the next challenge. Whether it's a battle, a training session, or just another long march, she tackles everything with relentless enthusiasm and refuses to slow down.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 59%

- Wades through hell with steady purpose. Bleeds, but never breaks.
- Always in motion. Tackles every task with tireless drive and urgency.

personality.description: Harrison picks up on unspoken words and subtle cues, adjusting his approach based on the emotions and ideas of those around him. His ability to read people makes him an effective leader, negotiator, and ally. Harrison doesn't trust victories. He's seen how overconfidence gets people killed, how one unchecked mistake can doom an entire squad. So he criticizes everything, no matter how small. Because if people stop improving, they stop surviving.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Reads the room better than the brief.

personality.description: Mike doesn't see the point in fighting for a bigger slice of the pie when he's already got enough to get by. Others can stress over promotions and prestige - he'll take his time, do what's necessary, and enjoy life without all the extra pressure. Mike is always wearing gloves, no exceptions. No one has ever seen him take them off - not to eat, not to fix his gear, not even to shake hands. Some assume it's habit, others think it's superstition. The truth? Mike won't say, and no one has the nerve to ask.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 48%

- Knows their lane. Won't leave it. Won't look up.

personality.description: Mu'awiyah is convinced he can handle anything, no matter how big the challenge. He stretches himself thin, takes on risks he shouldn't, and charges ahead without thinking about whether he can actually pull it off - because failure isn't part of his vocabulary. Yet. Mu'awiyah carries the burdens of others without hesitation. He listens, he understands, and he leads with heart - because to him, strength isn't about power, but about standing tall when others can't.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 55%

- Thinks confidence replaces planning. Runs headfirst into collapse.
- Leads from the front, heart wide open. Risky - but damn effective.

personality.description: Anbara moves like she's got an internal reactor running at full burn. Whether it's work, combat, or downtime, she tackles everything with relentless enthusiasm, always ready for the next challenge. Anbara moves through life like a ghost, detached from the surrounding chaos. Orders are followed, tasks are completed, but there's no fire behind her actions - just a quiet acceptance that nothing really changes.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 51%

- Moves like they're burning fuel nonstop. Thrives on constant engagement.
- Operates on autopilot. Body moves. Mind's already gone.

personality.description: Tuyet makes decisions in the heat of the moment, trusting gut instinct over careful planning. Whether in battle or conversation, she acts first and thinks later - sometimes to great effect, sometimes to great regret. "You trust that system? That's cute." Tuyet always has a backup plan, an alternative escape route, or a manual override ready to go. She assumes any warning system is too slow, any failsafe is flawed, and that if she doesn't prepare herself, no one else will.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 49%

- Gut-driven. Acts fast, sometimes smart - sometimes not. Unpredictable asset.

personality.description: To Tim, hesitation is just another word for failure. He throws caution aside, charging headlong into danger with raw aggression and an utter disregard for self-preservation. If survival means second-guessing, then maybe survival isn't worth it. Tim is a force of nature - chaotic, relentless, and impossible to pin down. His tactics shift constantly, his decisions keep enemies guessing, and his sheer momentum makes him nearly impossible to stop once he sets his sights on something.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 36%

- Ignores self-preservation. Sees hesitation as death. Risk of early burnout.
- Unpredictable, high-pressure operator - don't get in their way.

personality.description: Steve doesn't do safe. He thrives in the unknown, the uncertain, the dangerous - where risk is high and the rewards even higher. Whether it's luck, skill, or sheer nerve, he always seems to come out the other side with a grin. Crowds fuel him. Steve enjoys the spotlight, telling the best stories, leading the wildest celebrations, and making sure everyone is having a good time. If there's action, he's in the middle of it, keeping the momentum alive.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 51%

- Avoids safety by choice. Risk is the goal. Somehow, keeps surviving.
- Turns strangers into comrades before the first drinks gone.

personality.description: Corijn doesn't just enjoy passion - she commands it. With a confident smirk and an irresistible charm, she draws others into her orbit, knowing exactly how to fuel the fire of desire and leave them wanting more. Corijn doesn't make a big deal about it, but half the squad is wearing something she's made. She'll hand you a scarf or a jacket with zero fanfare, like she's handing over ammo. "Just take it. You'll freeze otherwise. Don't make it weird."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 53%

- Draws people in, burns hot, moves on. Makes allies - or mistakes - fast.

personality.description: Flávio doesn't waste time with hesitation - once a decision is made, he commits fully. On the battlefield, he acts with precision and confidence, knowing that in the chaos of war, a fast decision is often better than a perfect one. Flávio refuses to see a fight as unwinnable. Outnumbered? That just means more targets. Outgunned? They'll run out of ammo first. His confidence is unshakable, even when reality says otherwise. "We just need one good break. And trust me - it's coming."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 52%

- Commits fast, no waffling. Values momentum over precision. Trusts instinct.

personality.description: Adelaide isn't interested in quick victories - she's interested in certain victories. She waits, watches, and maneuvers every piece into place before making her move, ensuring that when the moment comes, her enemies never see it coming. Adelaide keeps her hands busy because if they stop, her mind wanders. Back to the names she's crossed out. Back to the missions that went wrong. So she spins the pen. Over and over. Faster. Slower. Anything to keep her fingers moving, to keep the silence from creeping in.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 46%

- Prefers certainty to speed. Strikes only when the board is set.

personality.description: Olivia's mind is a finely tuned weapon, cutting through distractions and deceptions with precision. She knows exactly when to push, when to hold back, and when to strike for maximum effect. Everything grates on her - people, orders, even the sound of her own comms. Olivia is always on edge, snapping at allies and enemies alike. Whether it's stress, trauma, or just who she is, her temper is a fuse ready to blow.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 59%

- Cold, precise, and never wastes a move.
- Radio chatter sets them off. So do people.

personality.description: Zak isn't afraid of consequences - he simply doesn't think about them. He jumps before looking, commits before planning, and laughs in the face of disaster, because for him, the thrill of the risk is always worth it. War isn't personal for Zak - it's a business. He weighs risks like investments, treats allies like temporary partners, and knows that in the end, survival isn't about honor - it's about profit.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 54%

- No thoughts of consequence. Laughs at disaster, races toward it.
- Treats battle like a spreadsheet. Risk/reward to the decimal.

personality.description: Zero acts before thinking, always ready to throw himself into a fight at the slightest provocation. Patience isn't his strong suit, and keeping Zero in check is often as dangerous as facing the enemy. Zero has seen too much, lost too much, to care anymore. The only thing that matters is getting the job done, and if that means making brutal decisions, so be it. In his world, kindness is just another word for weakness.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 49%

- Impulsive and volatile. Can be as dangerous to friendlies as hostiles.
- Bleeds others, not themself. Doesn't lose sleep.

personality.description: Compassion is a weakness Nairna can't afford. She doesn't hesitate to make hard decisions, sacrifice allies, or eliminate threats with cold efficiency. In her mind, survival means shutting out anything that might make her hesitate. Nairna pushes forward relentlessly, not just because she enjoys combat, but because slowing down means thinking. And thinking means acknowledging just how much this war has taken from her.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 19%

- Cuts ties as easily as throats - doesn't blink.

personality.description: Ben makes decisions in the heat of the moment, trusting gut instinct over careful planning. Whether in battle or conversation, he acts first and thinks later - sometimes to great effect, sometimes to great regret. Ben approaches every obstacle with the unshakable certainty that he can overcome it. He thrives in high-stakes moments, his excitement infectious as he drives himself and those around him forward with almost reckless enthusiasm.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 37%

- Gut-driven. Acts fast, sometimes smart - sometimes not. Unpredictable asset.
- Charges in with full belief - infectious, but risky under fire.

personality.description: Some call it paranoia; Dorotéia calls it survival. She keeps her eyes open, her mind sharp, and her instincts honed, because the moment she lets her guard down, she knows that's when disaster will strike. Dorotéia knows that power isn't given - it's taken. She maneuvers people like game pieces, striking deals with one hand and slipping a dagger in with the other. If there's an opportunity to get ahead, she'll take it before anyone else even sees it coming.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Calls it survival, not paranoia. Guard never drops, not for a second.
- Takes power, doesn't ask for it. Strikes fast, betrays faster.

personality.description: Pain, exhaustion, and impossible odds mean nothing to Pino. He will fight until the mission is done, even if it means crawling from the wreckage to finish the job with his bare hands. Pino doesn't believe in right or wrong - only results. He'll lie, cheat, steal, and betray without a second thought if it serves his interests. If someone expected honor or fairness from him, they were already doomed to fail.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 45%

- Will finish the mission bleeding and broken if needed. Pure willpower.
- No loyalty, no hesitation - if it helps, they'll do it.

personality.description: There's no such thing as overconfidence in Rojo's mind. Whether he's got the skills to back it up or not is irrelevant - he steps into every situation like he's already won and lets reality catch up later. Rojo genuinely cares about the people around him. He looks out for his unit, helps those in need, and does what he can to make life a little less cruel - even in a universe that doesn't reward kindness.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 60%

- Confidence exceeds ability. May succeed through force of will - or get others killed.
- Soft heart. Watches backs, not just flanks.

personality.description: If there's a risk to take, Kurie is already halfway through it. She thrives on danger, seeing every challenge as an opportunity and every battle as an adventure waiting to unfold. Safe choices are for lesser warriors. Kurie hoards food because she's seen what happens when people don't have enough. The fear, the desperation, the way alliances shatter over a single meal. She'd rather be prepared than be one of the ones begging.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- Risks draw them in. Sees combat as challenge, not threat.

personnel.description: Changed her surname from Taniguchi to Khong when marrying Rojo Khong

personality.description: Brandon has no patience for nonsense. He cuts through distractions and emotions, keeping his mind locked onto the mission. While others get lost in doubt or debate, he moves forward with ruthless efficiency. Brandon doesn't just think highly of himself - he expects everyone else to recognize his supposed brilliance. Whether it's in combat, leadership, or simple conversation, he makes sure everyone knows they're in the presence of greatness.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 54%

- No time for drama. Mission takes priority over everything.
- Needs applause before giving orders.

personality.description: Paul's patience is as short as his temper is explosive. He doesn't wait, doesn't deliberate - he reacts, fast and forceful, often leaving those around him scrambling to keep up. Paul commits fully to every action because he's seen what happens to people who hesitate. The ones who second-guess, who try to find a safer option, who pause at the wrong moment - they don't survive. So he doesn't stop. He doesn't hesitate. He just keeps going.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 46%

- Zero patience. Reacts fast, hits hard. Team scrambles to keep pace.

personality.description: Martín keeps everything - ammo, supplies, spare parts - because you never know when you'll need them. He refuses to let go of anything useful, even if it means stockpiling more than he could ever realistically use. Martín turns everything into a competition. Who gets the most confirmed kills? Who takes out the enemy 'Mek fastest? Who can pee the furthest? If there's a scoreboard, real or imaginary, Martín's keeping track. His squad puts up with it - mostly because, despite all the trash talk, he always buys the first round of drinks.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 46%

- Keeps everything that isn't nailed down. Doesn't share. Doesn't trust.

personality.description: Fosco never sits back and lets events unfold - he's always moving, always planning, always ensuring he's the one shaping the outcome rather than reacting to it. Persuasion is just another tool for control. Fosco knows exactly how to twist words, play on emotions, and push people into doing what he wants - whether they realize it or not. By the time they see the trap, it's already too late.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 49%

- Refuses to sit back. Takes the wheel, writes the outcome.
- Plays people like strings - never needs to raise a voice.

personality.description: Vi-Linlet doesn't get distracted, doesn't let setbacks slow her down. Every decision, every action is a step toward her goal. While others waver or compromise, she stays locked onto her objective, no matter what it takes to get there. Vi-Linlet rarely takes others seriously, rolling her eyes at concerns she doesn't find valid. Whether it's a risky plan, a personal grievance, or a suggestion she thinks is dumb, she shuts it down with a snide remark and moves on.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 56%

- Laser-focused. Doesn't waver, doesn't compromise - just advances.
- Eye-rolls and shutdowns. Doesn't bother pretending to care.

personality.description: A firm believer in the greater good, Grear acts with a generosity that others mistake for naivety. Her willingness to help, even when it puts her at a disadvantage, earns her both deep respect and ruthless exploitation from those less honorable. Grear's weapons, armor, and equipment are always in pieces, even when there's nothing wrong with them. She insists she's "just improving performance," but her lance has caught her reassembling a perfectly functional radio just because something 'felt off.'
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 52%

- Too good for this business. Won't last unless someone watches their back.

personality.description: Some people make friends. Millard makes enemies - and seems to prefer it that way. Whether through biting sarcasm or outright aggression, he turns every interaction into a fight waiting to happen, and frankly, Millard wouldn't have it any other way. Millard doesn't count for fun. He counts because it's the only thing keeping him grounded. He tracks shots, seconds, distances - anything but the number of bodies left behind. The moment he stops counting, he knows he'll have to face those numbers too.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 53%

- Makes enemies on purpose. Finds comfort in conflict, not camaraderie.

personality.description: Anastazja knows exactly how to push people to their limits - not for their benefit, but for her own. She pulls strings, applies pressure, and always ensures that the cost of her success is paid by someone else. Anastazja knows how to navigate difficult conversations without causing unnecessary conflict. She chooses her words carefully, smoothing over tensions and ensuring that problems get solved without making enemies.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 57%

- Pushes hard, but never pulls weight - others carry the burden.
- Knows when to talk, and more importantly, when not to.

personality.description: Ricardo naturally takes control of every situation, expecting others to follow his lead without question. Whether on the battlefield or in command, he believes that authority is best wielded with absolute confidence - and little room for dissent. Ricardo's energy is impossible to ignore. He drives conversations, sparks ideas, and keeps people moving, his sheer momentum pulling others along whether they're ready or not.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Assumes command by default. Expects obedience - no tolerance for dissent.
- Their energy drags others into action. Momentum becomes group inertia.

personality.description: Hyo-chin is most comfortable in the quiet, away from the noise and chaos of crowded rooms. He doesn't mind company, but he prefers to keep his circle small - only those he trusts, and even that list is short. Hyo-chin swears different machines have different moods. Some are stubborn, some are temperamental, and some respond to kindness. If something refuses to work, he doesn't assume it's broken - he assumes it's upset. "Give it a second. It's just being difficult today. Happens to everyone."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 49%

- Trust is earned. Rarely given.

personality.description: Ida doesn't just like to lead - she needs to. Every decision, every plan, every battle has to go her way, and she expects absolute obedience. Anything less is just another problem to be dealt with. Ida doesn't know where she picked up her habits, only that they have to be done. Before every mission, she mutters phrases in a language that isn't her, pockets a bullet casing from the last fight, and refuses to eat or drink in the last hour before deployment. "What happens if you stop?" someone asks. Ida just stares at them for an uncomfortably long time before replying, "We don't want to find out."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 47%

- Must be in charge. Demands obedience - anything else is interference.

personality.description: Stela acts on instinct, rarely stopping to consider the consequences before charging ahead. Whether on the battlefield or in conversation, she prefers action over hesitation - sometimes to her own detriment. Stela doesn't trust luck, instinct, or blind aggression. She trusts geometry. She's seen how battles turn into chaos, how emotions get people killed - but angles? Angles don't lie. "It's not about winning. It's about solving for X. And in this case, X is the fastest way to make them not my problem."
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 55%

- Leaps before looking. Trusts instinct over outcome. Risk to self and mission.

personality.description: Emily doesn't believe in rushing headfirst into a situation - she dissects it first. She considers risks, weighs benefits, and ensures that every move she makes is deliberate, calculated, and designed for maximum impact. Emily has a knack for perfectly-timed, emotionless one-liners. Explosions in the distance? "Well, that sounds promising." Half her lance wiped out? "Guess it's my turn to make coffee." It's never clear if she's joking, but it definitely helps break the tension.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 49%

- Dissects every situation before stepping in. No surprises.

personality.description: Sofia doesn't care what people think of her. Whether she's bragging, bending the truth, or cutting corners, she does what she wants without hesitation or embarrassment. Sofia doesn't waste a single calorie. Every meal is planned, every extra bite stored for later. While others celebrate after a mission with a feast, Sofia quietly pockets leftovers. "Might need it later," she mutters. Her lance jokes about it - until they're starving behind enemy lines and she's the only one still eating.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 50%

- No shame, no hesitation - just does whatever they want.

personality.description: Nell doesn't just take charge - she smothers every situation with her presence. Whether giving orders or offering "advice," she makes sure her voice is the loudest and her will is the only one that matters. Nell isn't content with following orders or playing it safe. She set her sights high, pursues her goals relentlessly, and never accepts limits - because to her, the only real obstacle is a lack of ambition.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 53%

- Dominates every room. Advice feels like orders - can't be ignored.
- Follows no one for long. Sets high goals and burns through barriers to reach them.

personality.description: Melody doesn't believe in dead ends - only obstacles waiting to be overcome. No setback, failure, or rejection is enough to make them walk away from something they've committed to. Every insult, every disagreement, every minor inconvenience is a personal attack in Melody's mind. They hold grudges for years, going out of their way to make sure anyone who crosses them regrets it, even if it costs them more than it's worth.
personality.interview_notes:
Performance Exam: 55%

- Sees setbacks as challenges, not endings. Keeps advancing.
- Thinks a cold shoulder counts as tactical retaliation.
